name: Night Class: A Vampire Story
description:
Rowan's life is at a bit of a dead end. To pick up her spirits and make her feel more in control, she enrols in a local night class. There she meets Jake and Aaron, a pair of brothers. But Jake and Aaron are more than they appear...

Night Class is a short, free game built using Visual Novel Maker. It has 6 unlockable CGs and three endings. 

***

  • Writing and production by Mary Borsellino
  • CG and menu art by Nii @6nii9
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Hospital background by Uncle Mugen
  • All other assets by Visual Novel Maker
  • Beta testing by Bishie Craft @BishieCraft
